name: ANGELS IN THE FIELD
briefDescription: Angels in the Field is a Non-profitable Humanitarian Grassroots Relief and Development Facilitator to promote transformed communities with an assured sustainability. Angels in the Field serves children, families and communities living in poverty and injustice regardless of religion, caste, race, ethnicity or gender.  It is an organization that serves for the freedom and comfort of the poor and marginalized.Angels in the Fieldâ€™s Vision for every child, family and community-life in all its abundance; our appeal for every heart-let it happen so.
